content: Please provide an example sentence that uses the word “precocious” in an HTML paragraph format. Additionally, please include a hyperlink to the definition of the word “precocious” from a reliable online dictionary.

Certainly! Here's an example sentence using the word "precocious" in an HTML paragraph format, along with a hyperlink to its definition: ```html

The precocious child astonished everyone with her ability to solve complex math problems at such a young age.

``` This HTML code provides a sentence where "precocious" is used, and the word is hyperlinked to its definition on the Merriam-Webster website.
